metadata.title: Workshop Verification | El7a2ny - Trusted & Verified Network
metadata.description: Learn about El7a2ny's comprehensive workshop verification process. We ensure all workshops meet our quality standards before joining our platform.

hero.title: Comprehensive Verification for Quality Assurance
hero.subtitle: We verify every workshop before joining our platform to ensure you get the best service. A comprehensive process including documents, field visits, and professional standards

whyVerification.title: Why Do We Verify Workshops?
whyVerification.subtitle: Comprehensive verification ensures you get the best service from trusted and certified workshops

items.title: Customer Protection
items.description: We ensure all workshops comply with highest quality and safety standards

items.title: Service Quality
items.description: Verification ensures customers receive high-quality service every time

items.title: Building Trust
items.description: We build customer trust through a reliable network of verified workshops

items.title: Global Standards
items.description: We apply global verification standards to ensure the best customer experience

verificationProcess.title: Verification Process Steps
verificationProcess.subtitle: A comprehensive 6-step process to ensure quality and reliability of all workshops on the platform

steps.title: Initial Application
steps.description: Fill out the initial application form with basic information about your workshop

steps.title: Document Submission
steps.description: Submit commercial registration, licenses, and required certificates

steps.title: Initial Review
steps.description: Our team reviews the submitted documents and information

steps.title: Field Visit
steps.description: Certified inspector visits the workshop to verify standards

steps.title: Final Review
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of all criteria and final decision

steps.title: Activation & Launch
steps.description: Workshop activation on platform and start receiving requests

verificationCriteria.title: Comprehensive Verification Criteria
verificationCriteria.subtitle: We apply strict criteria to ensure all workshops meet the highest standards of quality and professionalism

criteria.title: Licenses & Documents
criteria.description: Valid commercial registration and required municipal licenses

criteria.title: Location & Space
criteria.description: Suitable location and adequate space to provide high-quality services

criteria.title: Equipment & Tools
criteria.description: Modern equipment and specialized tools to ensure service quality

criteria.title: Team & Experience
criteria.description: Qualified team with sufficient experience in automotive maintenance

criteria.title: Quality Assurance
criteria.description: Commitment to quality standards and service guarantees

criteria.title: Reputation & Reviews
criteria.description: Good market reputation and positive customer references

benefits.title: Verification Benefits for Workshops
benefits.subtitle: Verified workshops receive additional benefits and greater customer trust
